Ahmed Marzougui

DevOps Engineer | Cloud | Automation | Security

View My Work

About Me

I am a final-year engineering student specializing in IT Infrastructure & Cloud Computing. Passionate about Kubernetes, CI/CD, Terraform, and AWS, I am seeking a 6-month full-time graduation internship in Cloud/DevOps starting December 2025.

Motivated, adaptable, and eager to contribute to cloud-native environments and innovative teams.

Download CV

Firewall

Projects

Terraform VPC Automation
  • Reusable Terraform modules for AWS VPC provisioning
  • Reduced deployment time by 70%
  • Consistent, scalable cloud infrastructure
GitHub
Automated KVM Virtual Lab
  • Provisioned VMs with Ansible, libvirt, and Cloud-init
  • Setup time reduced from hours to minutes
  • Ideal for DevOps and testing environments
Dev.to Article GitHub
AWS 3-Tier Architecture
  • Highly available, scalable AWS architecture
  • Secure network segmentation, autoscaling EC2, multi-AZ Aurora MySQL
GitHub
Helm Chart Deployment to EKS with GitLab CI/CD
  • Automated Helm chart deployments to Amazon EKS
  • GitLab CI/CD for Kubernetes and DevOps automation
Medium Guide GitLab Project
Collaborative File Sharing Platform
  • React frontend with AWS Cognito authentication
  • Serverless backend: Lambda, API Gateway, EFS, KMS
  • WAF protection, CloudWatch logging
Secure, scalable, and cost-efficient file sharing
OpenStack Private Cloud & AI Platform
  • Private cloud on 7 machines with OpenStack, Ansible, Docker
  • WorkMate: AI-powered education platform
  • Hybrid cloud: OpenStack (Kubernetes + MySQL) & AWS (EC2 + S3)
  • Grafana monitoring
Spring Boot on AWS ECS Fargate
  • Automated CI/CD with GitHub, CodePipeline, CodeBuild, ECR
  • Zero-downtime deployments to ECS Fargate
  • Auto-scaling for high availability
GitHub
CI/CD Pipeline for Node.js on Kubernetes
  • Automated pipeline: Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes
  • Static analysis, containerization, monitoring, Slack notifications
CI/CD Pipeline Optimization
  • Automated pipeline: Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, GitHub, AWS EC2
  • 50+ builds, deployment in under 5 minutes
  • 30% fewer human errors, real-time monitoring

Experience

DevSecOps Intern — ST2I
Tunisia • Jun 2025 – Sep 2025
  • Shipped Spring Boot microservices on OpenShift with Helm & RBAC; −87% deploy time across 3 envs; +35% SonarQube score.
  • Adopted GitOps with Argo CD; CI/CD (GitLab, Trivy, SonarQube, Prometheus, Grafana); 99.5% uptime; 95% vulns caught pre-prod.
OpenShift Helm Argo CD GitLab CI Trivy SonarQube Prometheus Grafana Spring Boot Kubernetes
View Project
DevOps Intern — SOCOOPEC
Tunisia • Jun 2024 – Jul 2024
  • Built stock management app (Angular + Spring Boot, JWT auth).
  • Automated delivery with GitHub Actions to AWS EC2; −80% manual effort.
Angular Spring Boot JWT GitHub Actions Docker AWS EC2 Nginx
View Project

Education

  • IT Infrastructure and Cloud Technology Engineering - Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies (2022–Present)
  • Mathematics and Physics Preparatory Cycle - Higher Institute of Applied Sciences and Technology of Mahdia, Tunisia (2019–2022)

Languages

  • French (B2)
  • English (B2)
  • German (A2)
  • Arabic (C2)

Contact
